3: You pass through the cluster of Program Ghosts and keeps walking, until an armored protection layer stops you in your tracks.
A highly complicated data blockade stands in front of a closed space.
Given the complexity of the blockade, it will probably take you quite some time to deactivate it.
...We don't have time to go back now. We need to come up with a method to force our way through.
It seems like it. What should we do?
...The team is looking your way now.
The space behind becomes accessible as soon as the blockade is deactivated.
